title: How to go to bed - Quora

response.answer_text: In this technological-era people are suffering from fatigue and sleep is one of the best thing you can give to your body. Sleeping habits varies person-to-person. But what everyone can follow is these 5 actionable habits for a better sleep.  1. Drink Milk Before Going To Bed :    Drinking a glass of warm milk before bed will help you to sleep better - it's not just a tale. Dairy products are rich in the amino acid tryptophan, which helps in the production of the sleep inducing brain chemicals, serotonin and melatonin. 2. Turn Your Bedroom Into Cave :  Before going to sleep make your room dark as much as you can, and take the step by switching off the light. Sleep in complete darkness.  (Tip: you can also change your current curtains into Black colour) 3. No Phones In The Bedroom :  Your phones blue light is the biggest reason why you are still awake. So keep your phones in another room and prevent yourself from social media.  4. Exercise In Morning :   Exercising in the mornings improves blood pressure and sleep quality. People sleep significantly better and feel more alert during the day if they get at least 150 minutes of exercise a week, a new study concludes.   5. Positivity :   Don't complain and have the present opportunity to accept the things. There's always a tomorrow. If you didn't get a good night sleep today then tell yourself you will get better.  I hope these 5 simple actionable habits will make you go to bed fast and effectively.  The post was originally posted here if you need proof : How To Sleep Better In 1 hour? Here is my routine. Time Machine (In my mind)For 30 minutes I go back to my day and rethink all the things happened . If something was negative in my day I change it to positve in my mind. StretchingI do it for 30 minutes. It helps to relax my muscles and body after long day. Cottage CheeseI eat it now for 5 years before bed time. Creating to do list for TomorrowIt helps me to be more productive in the next morning. 10 Power minutes for myself I start these 10 minutes with breathing exercise ( For 2 minutes), then I think about 3 things that I'm thankful for (4 minutes), and then I finish these 10 minutes with vision how I achieved my 3 goals.  After these 10 minutes I feel fresh, positive and motivated.   Go to bed!
